com.vtls.opensource.ldap
Class LDAP

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.ldap.LDAP

public class LDAP
extends Object

Connects to an LDAP server to authenticate and/or describe a user. http://www.middleware.vt.edu/pubs/opensource/ldap/

Author:
Chris Hall
